Intro: The mutant known only as Bishop was born in the 21st Century A.D. of alternate timeline Earth-1191. Bishop can absorb most types of energy, including magic and psychic, directed toward him. The nature of his powers makes it difficult to damage him with energy-based attacks.

 Origin: Bishop first appears as a member of Xavier's Security Enforcers (initially called the Xavier School Enforcers), a mutant police force from a dystopian future of the Marvel Universe. He travels to the 20th century and joins the X-Men, a team he knew only as legends.

 Powers: energy absorption, energy projection, concussive blasts, strength, fast healing, limited invulnerability, instinctively knows his location at all times.
